summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Report Builder Chart Resizing feature and Code Refactoring verification. All 19 tests passed: Login works, Report Builder page loads, width dropdown (25%, 50%, 75%, 100%) is visible and functional for all sections, width changes correctly resize sections visually, all 7 section types (stat_cards, bar_chart, pie_chart, line_chart, data_table, intro, conclusion) render correctly after refactoring, Add Section panel works, move up/down buttons work, delete section works, Preview mode hides edit controls, theme selector changes colors, Export PDF generates multi-page PDF with success toast.

frontend: Report Builder page loads with data-testid='report-builder-page'
Width dropdown for section 0 (stat_cards) exists with value 100%
Width dropdown for section 1 (bar_chart) exists with initial value 50%
Changed section 1 width from 50% to 75% - visual resize confirmed
Changed section 1 width to 25% - visual resize confirmed
Changed section 1 width to 100% - visual full-width confirmed
Section types rendering correctly: stat_cards, bar_chart, data_table, intro, pie_chart, line_chart, conclusion
Add Section panel works - added text_block section
Move Up button works - section moved up
Preview mode activated - button shows 'Edit Mode'
Preview mode hides edit controls (width dropdown)
Theme selector works - changed to Purple & Teal
Export PDF completed successfully with toast 'Report exported successfully! (2 pages)'

critical_code_review_comments: Code refactoring successful - ReportBuilderPage.jsx reduced from 1100+ lines to ~300 lines
Component extraction well organized in /app/frontend/src/components/report/ folder
Barrel file (index.js) properly exports all components
WIDTH_OPTIONS array correctly defined with 25%, 50%, 75%, 100% values
data-testid attributes properly added for resize-width-{index} selectors
context_for_next_testing_agent: Chart Resizing feature fully functional. Key test IDs: resize-width-{index} (width dropdown with 25/50/75/100 options), report-section-{index} (section container). Refactored components in /app/frontend/src/components/report/: ReportSection.jsx (contains WIDTH_OPTIONS and resize logic), ThemeSelector.jsx, StatCard.jsx, ChartPreviews.jsx, AddSectionPanel.jsx. All section types render correctly after refactoring.

chart_resizing.entry_point: Width dropdown in each section header
features_verified: Width dropdown visible for all sections
Changing width to 25% resizes section correctly
Changing width to 50% resizes section correctly
Changing width to 75% resizes section correctly
Changing width to 100% makes section full width

components_verified: ReportSection.jsx - contains WIDTH_OPTIONS and render logic
ChartPreviews.jsx - bar, pie, line charts and data table
index.js - barrel file exports all components
features_verified: All 7 section types render correctly (stat_cards, bar_chart, pie_chart, line_chart, data_table, intro, conclusion)
